verses.1: Benjamin was the father of Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second son, Aharah the third,
verses.2: Nohah the fourth and Rapha the fifth.
verses.3: The sons of Bela were: Addar, Gera, Abihud,
verses.6: These were the descendants of Ehud, who were heads of families of those living in Geba and were deported to Manahath:
verses.7: Naaman, Ahijah, and Gera, who deported them and who was the father of Uzza and Ahihud.
verses.8: Sons were born to Shaharaim in Moab after he had divorced his wives Hushim and Baara.
verses.9: By his wife Hodesh he had Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malcam,
verses.10: Jeuz, Sakia and Mirmah. These were his sons, heads of families.
verses.11: By Hushim he had Abitub and Elpaal.
verses.12: The sons of Elpaal: Eber, Misham, Shemed (who built Ono and Lod with its surrounding villages),
verses.13: and Beriah and Shema, who were heads of families of those living in Aijalon and who drove out the inhabitants of Gath.
verses.16: Michael, Ishpah and Joha were the sons of Beriah.
verses.18: Ishmerai, Izliah and Jobab were the sons of Elpaal.
verses.21: Adaiah, Beraiah and Shimrath were the sons of Shimei.
verses.25: Iphdeiah and Penuel were the sons of Shashak.
verses.27: Jaareshiah, Elijah and Zicri were the sons of Jeroham.
verses.29: Jeiel the father of Gibeon lived in Gibeon. His wife's name was Maacah,
verses.28: All these were heads of families, chiefs as listed in their genealogy, and they lived in Jerusalem.
verses.30: and his firstborn son was Abdon, followed by Zur, Kish, Baal, Ner, Nadab,
verses.34: The son of Jonathan: Merib-Baal, who was the father of Micah.
verses.35: The sons of Micah: Pithon, Melech, Tarea and Ahaz.
verses.32: and Mikloth, who was the father of Shimeah. They too lived near their relatives in Jerusalem.
verses.33: Ner was the father of Kish, Kish the father of Saul, and Saul the father of Jonathan, Malki-Shua, Abinadab and Esh-Baal.
verses.38: Azel had six sons, and these were their names: Azrikam, Bokeru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah and Hanan. All these were the sons of Azel.
verses.39: The sons of his brother Eshek: Ulam his firstborn, Jeush the second son and Eliphelet the third.
verses.36: Ahaz was the father of Jehoaddah, Jehoaddah was the father of Alemeth, Azmaveth and Zimri, and Zimri was the father of Moza.
verses.37: Moza was the father of Binea; Raphah was his son, Eleasah his son and Azel his son.
verses.40: The sons of Ulam were brave warriors who could handle the bow. They had many sons and grandsons-150 in all. All these were the descendants of Benjamin.
